item.title: Implementing the Saga Pattern With MassTransit
item.description: Long-running business processes often require multiple services working together, but traditional distributed transactions can be problematic at scale. Learn how to implement the Saga pattern using MassTransit to break complex workflows into manageable steps with proper error handling and state management. Link to article: https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/blog/implementing-the-saga-pattern-with-masstransit
